ChunkText: you asked isss to make a change in your immigration record today, but you dont see the change in the portal yet: there is a one-day delay in when information entered directly into the sevis immigration system is updated in the portal. try again after one day to verify the change.
ContextBefore: sevp is concerned that scammers may target students on OPT with fake emails about the portal to try to get your personal information. if you receive an email you arent sure about, please contact us and we can help determine if it is legitimate.
